album.title: Forever Young, Gifted And Black: Songs Of Freedom And Spirit

track.name: To Be Young, Gifted And Black
comments: To be old, giftless, and white...isn't where it's at.
am I only the only one to hear low level chatter for the first minute, sorry got bored
this would've been a good song to hear in my early formative years of education
Outdoor concert on youtube worth seeing, includes this powerful song.

NINA, OH SUCH A INDESCRIBEABLE SONG.  TO BE YOUNG, GIFTED,

AND BLACK, YOU ARE YOUNG, GIFTED, AND BLACK AND THAT'S A

FACT!  NINA SIMONE HAD TO LIVE IN ANOTHER COUNTRY TO GET

HER VOICE HEARD.  BUT SHE NEVER LEFT HER PEOPLE AND WAS

VERY AWARE OF HER PEOPLES' STRUGGLE IN THE UNITED STATES

AND EVERYWHERE ELSE IN THE WORLD!  MY MOTHER QUEEN - 

NINA SIMONE ...... THANK YOU!
Bless you Miss Nina Simone & Weldon Irvine for this song. The world needed this to compliment Lorraine Hansberry's book, "To Be Young GIfted & Black."
inside we're all young, gifted and black (in our various ways :)
meravigliosa, amo la sua voce e il suo soul. Wonderfull, I love her voice and her soul too.
